subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|㷊}} (The bottom ([[火]]) has been abbreviated into [[灬]])
* {{l|mul|燓}} (Based on the seal script form of the character)

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|ic}} - fire ([[火]]) + trees ([[木]], duplicated into [[林]]); hence the definition "burn". The seal script form has two diagonal crosses between the two trees ([[爻]]) symbolizng bushes.
